mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "RC"."F_COMPARE" ( "GUID", "USER_GUID", "NAME", "CERTID", "RETURN_CODE", "RETURN_INFO", "CODE1", "SIMILARITY1", "SOURCE_CODE", "SOURCE_INFO", "HOLD_TIME", "USER_TYPE", "TYPE_NAME", "COMPARE_TYPE", "BAR_CODE", "CERTID_TYPE", "MOBILE" ) select "GUID", #{cacheListBean.user_guid} "USER_GUID", "NAME", "ID_NUMBER" "CERTID", "RETURN_CODE", "RETURN_INFO", "CODE" "CODE1", "SIMILARITY" "SIMILARITY1", "SOURCE_CODE", "SOURCE_INFO", "HOLD_TIME", "USER_TYPE", "TYPE_NAME", #{cacheListBean.compare_guid} "COMPARE_TYPE", "BAR_CODE", "ID_TYPE" "CERTID_TYPE", "MOBILE" from "RC"."F_CACHE_HISTORY" T WHERE T.ETYPE='1' AND T.BAR_CODE = #{barCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT TYPEID typeId, TOTALCOUNT totalCount, RIGHTCOUNT rightCount FROM ( SELECT A .TYPEID, A .TOTALCOUNT, B.RIGHTCOUNT, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT COUNT (1) totalCount, COMPARE_TYPE typeId FROM F_COMPARE WHERE BAR_FLAG = '0' AND COMPARE_TYPE <> '000' GROUP BY COMPARE_TYPE ORDER BY COMPARE_TYPE ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT (1) rightCount, COMPARE_TYPE typeId FROM F_COMPARE WHERE RETURN_CODE = '0' AND BAR_FLAG = '0' AND COMPARE_TYPE <> '000' GROUP BY COMPARE_TYPE ORDER BY COMPARE_TYPE ) B ON A .TYPEID = B.TYPEID ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
and TYPEID = #{statBean.typeGuid}
SELECT COUNT (1) FROM ( SELECT COUNT (1) FROM F_COMPARE WHERE BAR_FLAG = '0' AND COMPARE_TYPE <> '000' GROUP BY COMPARE_TYPE )
